com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.provider

Class Providers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppm.integration.agilesdk.provider.Providers

  • public abstract class Providers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the various data providers that Agile SDK Connectors can use to retrieve data from the PPM server:
    • server.conf properties (ServerConfigurationProvider)
    • Localized strings (LocalizationProvider)
    • Users information (UserProvider)
    Since:
    PPM9.3.0
